baseline_groups.claim_summary: Climate damages follow a power law in temperature with exponent d2 approximately 2, estimated via log-log meta-regression from Howard and Sterner (2017) data.
baseline_groups.notes: Single baseline from Table 1. Coefficient on logt is damage exponent d2 = 1.88 (SE = 0.45). N=43.

global_notes: Single empirical claim (Table 1). 78 specs. Bootstrap has invalid p>1. Heterogeneity interaction specs report conditional main effects.
